snippet: HEISLER--Dr. Donald. American Friends of Soroka Medical Center extends their heartfelt condolences to our Executive Director, Rachel Heisler Sheinfeld and her family on the passing of her beloved father, Dr. Donald Heisler. Ken Abramowitz, Pres Caroline Freidfertig, Sec Ruth Steinberg, Tr 1/3
lead_paragraph: HEISLER--Dr. Donald. American Friends of Soroka Medical Center extends their heartfelt condolences to our Executive Director, Rachel Heisler Sheinfeld and her family on the passing of her beloved father, Dr. Donald Heisler. Ken Abramowitz, Pres Caroline Freidfertig, Sec Ruth Steinberg, Tr 1/3
